programme.title: Love Wrecked
programme.desc: Jenny Taylor (Amanda Bynes) has found her ideal man who she just knows would sweep her off her feet. The only problem? He's Jason Masters (Chris Carmack), the world's biggest rock star. Hoping for a chance to get close to her idol, Jenny takes a job in his favourite Caribbean resort with her best friend Ryan (Jonathan Bennett). When Jason is washed overboard in a storm, Jenny jumps in to save him and the pair find themselves stranded on a seemingly-deserted tropical island.

programme.title: One Night Stand (2016)
programme.desc: Womanizing advertising executive Aaron tries to stop best friend Sean from falling into the ""eternal damnation"" of marriage by throwing a wild bachelor party to remind Sean of the joys of bachelorhood.

programme.title: Couples Vacation
programme.desc: With his marriage and career against the ropes, dejected author Jack Spencer travels with his wife, Amanda, to an isolated glamping retreat in search of a spark. When a surprise double booking finds their private retreat anything but private, Jack spins into a comedic exploration of love, lost dreams, small-town-wisdom, and friendship with a miniature donkey to get over himself before he loses all he holds dear.

programme.title: Bad Parents
programme.desc: Let the battle commence in Bad Parents, a hilarious, comedic look into the manic world of football and overzealous parents! Suburban mother Kathy (Janeane Garofalo: Ratatouille) is thrust into the hypercompetitive world of football when she signs up her 7-year-old daughter for a team with a mass of crazy parents involved. The game is on in this hysterical comedy!

programme.title: Entanglement
programme.desc: Entanglement' is a charmingly quirky romantic comedy with a twist! While searching for the meaning of his existence, Ben Layton (Thomas Middleditch: 'Silicon Valley') uncovers a family secret that leads him to a woman named Hanna (Jess Weixler: 'The Good Wife') who might have almost been his adopted sister. But when he and Hanna inadvertently fall in love, and his life becomes increasingly and weirdly complicated, Ben starts to realise that everything is incredibly connected and love may give him a new lease on life.

programme.title: Ancient Grains - Amaranth
programme.desc: When you open your pantry, do images of the rugged mountains of South America, the colorful tablelands of Africa and the fertile river valleys of the Middle East dance before your eyes? If not, you have yet to discover amaranth, quinoa, spelt, kamut and teff, the quintet of nutritional powerhouses known as the ancient grains. The legends behind their origins many millennia past, their loss over time and their ultimate modern revival - literally tell the story of civilization.

programme.title: Ancient Grains - Quinoa
programme.desc: When you open your pantry, do images of the rugged mountains of South America, the colorful tablelands of Africa and the fertile river valleys of the Middle East dance before your eyes? The legends behind their origins many millennia past, their loss over time and their ultimate modern revival - literally tell the story of civilization.

programme.title: The Plastic Whales of Amsterdam
programme.desc: We're all aware that we need to reuse our plastic, but one entrepreneur took it to the extreme. When the Amsterdam canals were becoming too clogged with plastic, Marius Smit founded the Plastic Whale, a boat made out of plastic with the sole purpose of fishing for more.

programme.title: Black Sunday
programme.desc: A detailed report of the Holocaust in Romania. During World War II, two trains were loaded with Jews. Where they will be taken? To their deaths. Four survivors of Romanian Holocaust tell us what happened in Iasi during the Pogrom, a horror which took place on June 29, 1941. Over 13,000 people died in that single day, a day which has become known as Black Sunday in remembrance of those who lost their lives.

programme.title: Worlds Greatest Airshows
programme.desc: From the very first air show held at Rheims, France in 1909 air shows have been the subject of countless numbers of films. This documentary features the displays that have made air shows so successful and memorable.

programme.title: The Red Arrows Story
programme.desc: For over 40 years The Red Arrows have been thrilling crowds at air shows both across the UK and internationally. They are quite simply the best at what they do. The Red Arrows, officially the Royal Air Force Display Team, are the public face of the RAF, formally promoting recruitment, as well as providing inspiration to significant numbers of those who join the Royal Air Force.

programme.title: Nation On Fire
programme.desc: Kyiv, the Ukrainian capital, has been gripped by unrest in recent times. This is a unique portrait of a nation in suspense, a nation in fear, a nation in waiting. A rare and exclusive snapshot of the days after the riots but before the storm.

programme.title: Amazonas
programme.desc: Numerous climatic, political and civilising changes have a great impact on the settlements in the central Amazon area. Step by step the local people develop their own mentality regarding a sustainable and well-adapted life in the heart of the Amazon rain forests. In 2012, the film maker Thomas Miklautsch from Carinthia, together with his assistant Anja Krois, set off to travel for several months along the Amazon, from the Columbian Leticia to Rio Ampiyaco near Iquitos in Peru, always in harmony

programme.title: Green is the new black
programme.desc: Fashion dictates that we must buy, buy, buy. We take a behind the scenes look into the apparel industry to see what big brands are doing to improve their eco-footprint. Or is it their eco-image?

programme.title: Karun
programme.desc: Karun: Misadventures On Iran’s Longest River' - British adventurers Tom Allen and Leon McCarron set out to follow Iran’s longest river, the Karun, by human powered means. Their aim is to go beyond the politics and explore the culture and geography of this most misunderstood of nations and have a great adventure doing so. But despite Tom’s previous experience of travel in Iran, they find that cultural differences run deeper than they’d realised.

programme.title: Aina
programme.desc: ‘ĀINA: That Which Feeds Us’ – The best-kept secret on Kaua`i isn’t a secluded beach or local surf spot, it’s that four of the world’s largest chemical companies are using the island as an open-air testing ground for pesticides on genetically modified crops. Winner Accolades Global Film Competition.

programme.title: Goshen
programme.desc: ‘Goshen – Places of Refuge for the Running People’ is a powerful documentary depicting the diet and active lifestyle of the indigenous Tarahumara, a light-footed running tribe, who are striving to maintain their ancient culture against all odds.

This is the interactive experience that lets you "be Messi for a day", ending with the long-awaited premiere of Messi10 in Barcelona. We will accompany the creators, artists and Messi on a trip from Montreal to Barcelona and discover a story about dreams that come true. MessiCirque combines Cirque du Soleil´s vision to tell, for the first time, the story of a living sports legend with a child´s ambition to play football.

programme.title: SEVE - Artist, Fighter, Legend
programme.desc: Seve Ballesteros was an artist, a golfing Picasso. He was a fighter against back injury, rivals on the golf course, a disintegrating swing, and finally cancer. He remains a legend, a multi-major champion and the man who made the modern Ryder Cup. This is his story, from members of his inner circle, other sporting greats and from himself via newly unearthed material.

programme.title: Anything is Possible
programme.desc: Serge Ibaka grew up poor and at times homeless in the streets of Brazzaville. His mom died when he was 7. His dad was in prison when he was 12. Despite these overwhelming obstaces he achieved his dream of becoming an NBA Champion. This documentary follows Serge on his journey home to the Republic of Congo, to show them the NBA Championship trophy but more importantly he shares a message that through hard work and determination, "Anything is Possible"!

programme.title: Ride Your Dream
programme.desc: Motorcycling was a man’s world, until now. This documentary introduces us to Ana Carrasco, the Spanish rider who has revolutionised the two wheels’ world and who, from an early age, had a clear dream: being world champion. Through intimate conversations with her family and team, we get to know Ana’s motivations, the obstacles she has faced and the dreams she keeps chasing. Her career, from its origins in a small town in Murcia to being the first woman to win the World Championship, is a source of inspiration for anyone. Ana herself is a clear example of overcoming struggle and tenacity, and her story which is full of exciting moments encourages us all to fight for our dreams.

programme.title: MessiCirque
programme.desc: We will see the formative moments, the creative and artistic development, Messi´s participation with the project, training, rehearsals and the "Messi10 Challenge LaLiga". programme.desc: Serge Ibaka grew up poor and at times homeless in the streets of Brazzaville. His mom died when he was 7. His dad was in prison when he was 12. This documentary follows Serge on his journey home to the Republic of Congo, to show them the NBA Championship trophy but more importantly he shares a message that through hard work and determination, "Anything is Possible"!

programme.title: Break Point: a Davis Cup Story
programme.desc: Led by Rafa Nadal, the Spanish team were this year’s favourite until they suffered a serious setback. The team’s number two player, Roberto Bautista, had to leave the competition for his hometown to be at his father´s side during the last hours of his life. Without Bautista, Nadal and Feliciano López heroically managed to lead the team into the final. But then came the news that thrilled tennis fans worldwide: Bautista is coming back to the competition after his father´s funeral, and he´s ready to play. United again, the members of the Spanish team fight for victory in the grand final, where something far beyond tennis is at stake.

programme.title: Eighteam
programme.desc: The Chipolopolo is the Zambia national team that at the 1988 Olympic thrashes Italy 4-0 and has their eyes on the Africa Cup of Nations. But in 1993 a Zambian Air Force ditches into the ocean about 500 metres offshore from Gabon. All passengers, including 18 players, die in the accident.The Chipolopolo's captain, Kalusha Bwalya, who is not aboard the ill-fated flight puts his efforts to build a new team and make a professional federation becoming later the national team coach and president of the Football Association of Zambia. Two decades later, destiny makes Zambia a blink: in Gabon, Zambia becomes African champions for the first time after a long penalty shoot-out. There are 18 penalties.

programme.title: Dr Death: Harold Shipman
programme.desc: Britain’s biggest serial killer was a doctor, Dr Harold Shipman. Unsuspected for many years, Dr. Shipman selected his victims from his patient list. There were clues, but who in the community would believe that a doctor would kill his patients? Suspected of killing over 350 people during his career, it was clumsy attempts at forging the will of one of his victims in his own favour that alerted the police and led to his arrest. Found guilty at his trial and jailed for life, Dr Shipman committed suicide never accepting his guilt.

programme.title: Secrets of the Universe
programme.desc: There is a rare class of volcanic eruptions that marshal the energy that lurks, like a sleeping dragon, beneath the surface of planet Earth. Reach back 70 thousand years to the island of Sumatra, when Earth’s crust literally collapsed, initiating one of the largest single eruptions known. Fly down to the mother of all eruptions, 250 million years ago, when the infamous Siberian Traps set in motion the largest mass extinction in Earth’s history. Move beyond Earth to explore the impact of giant volcanic eruptions around our solar system, on Neptune's frigid moon Triton, and the ultimate volcanic realm: Jupiter's moon Io. On a visit to a legendary North American hot spot, Yellowstone National Park, the film asks: can a supervolcano erupt in our time?

programme.title: Secrets of the Universe
programme.desc: The inner workings of Earth's climate system come alive in visualizations based on satellite monitoring data and advanced supercomputer simulations. This cutting-edge production follows a trail of energy that flows from the Sun down into the interlocking systems that shape our climate: the atmosphere, oceans, and the biosphere. Ride along on swirling ocean and wind currents, dive into the heart of a monster hurricane, come face-to-face with sharks and gigantic whales, and fly into roiling volcanoes.

programme.title: Hitler's Mein Kampf: A Dangerous Book
programme.desc: In 2016, 70 years after the death of his author, Mein Kampf entered into the public domain. Several questions arise with it: why does the book remain so dangerous? Why do Hitler’s thoughts remain so fascinating?

programme.title: Aliens: Are We Alone?
programme.desc: Does alien life exist out there in the Universe? Scientists are now getting closer than ever to answering that question thanks to the Kepler Space Telescope. This revolutionary spacecraft is on a mission to find habitable alien planets. Thanks to Kepler, we now know of thousands of possible planets and we’re getting closer than ever to finding the holy grail: a twin of our Earth. We use CGI to bring these alien worlds to life, and with the help of scientists, we speculate on what extra-terrestrial life might be like.

programme.title: Surf's Cooking

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell and motoring journalist Chris Harris put two track focused supercars through their paces - the Ferrari 458 Speciale and the Porsche 911 GT3. Tests involving agility, road manners and head to head racing will decide which is best. The Fifth Gear team also test the latest version of Vauxhall's popular Corsa model to find out if it's as good as Ford's even more successful Fiesta.

programme.title: The Secret Life of Materials
programme.desc: From the earliest tool from a piece of stone to implanted bionics, the history of human civilization is a history of materials. Today more than ever we need to use materials intelligently to meet the challenges of tomorrow. The film takes us on a journey to meet the pioneers of material science and reveal their extraordinary discoveries that are transforming the world around us.

programme.title: Who Is In Control?

Beyond the controversy, this film digs into the history and the evolution of the WHO, from its early successes based on international cooperation to an organization torn apart by conflicting interests.

Leaving Mexico for Los Angeles to find the baby's mother, Valentin ends up finding a new home for himself and his newfound daughter, Maggie. An unlikely father figure, Valentin raises Maggie for six years, while also establishing himself as one of Hollywood's top stuntmen to pay the bills, with Maggie acting as his on-set coach. As Valentin raises Maggie, she forces him to grow up too. But their unique and offbeat family is threatened when Maggie's birth mom, Julie, shows up out of the blue after six years after turning her own life around and wants full custody of Maggie, and Valentin realizes he's in danger of losing his daughter - and his best friend.

programme.title: Deconstructing Harry

As he is about to be honored for his writing by the college that expelled him, he faces writer's block and the impending marriage of his latest flame to a writer friend. As scenes from his stories and novels pass and interact with him, Harry faces the people whose lives he has affected - wives, lovers, his son, his sister.

programme.title: Munki and Trunk - Season 1 - Episodes 4-6
programme.desc: Walk This Way | Bloomin' Emergency | I Would Walk 500 Miles Munki and Trunk is a tree-crashing, rock-smashing, water-splashing, fruit-mashing knockabout comedy adventure! Munki (a bold, banana-juggling adventurer) and Trunk (a big-hearted and optimistic elephant) are best friends. They do everything together - swinging, stomping and somersaulting as they explore their jungle world, hatching plans, solving problems, having fun and helping friends along the way.

programme.title: Green Light - Season 1 - Episodes 1-4
programme.desc: Pedestrian traffic lights | Seat belt | Getting out of the car | Traffic police How do you have to cross the street? How do you have to go by bicycle? Those, and many other basic rules of Road Safety, will be taught to the youngest, by a master-police officer and his inseparable Lucio, with visual examples of what happens if things are done well and what happens if they are done badly.

programme.title: Raindrop - Season 1 - Raindrop's Birth
programme.desc: Raindrop is a drop of water. You can find it in the forest, in the river, in the sea and even in your house. Surrounded by her friends Vaporón (a cloud) and Frigote (a cube of ice), she will live many adventures and defeat a germ, the evil bacteria, in her attempt to destroy the environment

programme.title: Wallace and Gromit's Cracking Contraptions - Season 1 - Episodes 1-5
programme.desc: The Soccamatic The Tellyscope A Christmas Cardomatic The Autochef The Snowmanatron Wallace invents an array of contraptions to try and make life easier but it's always Gromit who picks up the pieces.

programme.title: Pumpkin Reports - Season 1 - Episodes 31-32
programme.desc: To sleep perchance to invade | Cook & conquer Max Green’s new brother and sister are aliens sent to Earth as the advance party for an invasion - and he’s the only one who can stop them turning humans into unwilling slave-gardeners.

programme.title: Pumpkin Reports - Season 1 - Episodes 47-48
programme.desc: A day in the life of Teresa | Chicken chase Max Green’s new brother and sister are aliens sent to Earth as the advance party for an invasion - and he’s the only one who can stop them turning humans into unwilling slave-gardeners.

programme.title: Pocoyó - Season 3 - Let's Go Pocoyo! - Episodes 22-24
programme.desc: Elly's Market | Pato's Bedtime | A hole in one!

programme.title: Zumbers - Season 1 - Episodes 92-98
programme.desc: Duck | Book | Sun | Clam | Chicken | Gloves | Jellyfish Five characters, accompanied by their inseparable vehicle-gadget, sets out on a journey where the main purpose is to eat, one by one, the delicious round pastries scattered around the garden.

programme.title: Pocoyó - Season 3 - Let's Go Pocoyo! - Episodes 4-6
programme.desc: The Garden | Pato, the postman | Colours

programme.title: Molang - Season 1 - Episodes 29-35
programme.desc: The Archaeologists The Hockey Game The Castle The Shepherds The Puppy The Underground Walk The Hotel Molang is an affectionate, humorous look at the relationship between an eccentric, joyful, and enthusiastic rabbit, and a shy, discreet, and emotional little chick. The series explores Molang and Piu Piu’s everyday life with warmth and humor.

programme.title: Nuts Nuts Nuts - Season 1 - Episodes 8-14
programme.desc: The sheepfold Oasis Shifting sand The arrival of the penguins The mill Oil The farm Nuts is an obsessed, clumsy blue squirrel. He lives with other animals ina crazy, lively, funny and sometimes absurd world. Wherever he goes, he causes disasters...

programme.title: Telmo And Tula, Little Cooks - Season 1 - Episodes 4-6
programme.desc: Chocolate Cake | Anchovy and Tomatoe Sandwich | Chocolate Chip Cookies Telmo & Tula is a very fun animated series in which children learn to cook the best breakfasts, sandwiches, salads and desserts in a safe and entertaining way. Telmo and Tula will teach children how fun it is to prepare delicious meals step by step.

programme.title: Molang - Season 1 - Episodes 36-42
programme.desc: The Explorers The Football Player The Robot A Friendly Rugby Game The Firemen The Keys The Lighthouse Molang is an affectionate, humorous look at the relationship between an eccentric, joyful, and enthusiastic rabbit, and a shy, discreet, and emotional little chick. The series explores Molang and Piu Piu’s everyday life with warmth and humor.

programme.title: Finding Altamira
programme.desc: 1879, nine-year-old Maria Sautuola and her father, Marcelino, discover the first cave art and accomplished paintings of galloping bison. But Maria's mother, devout Conchita, is disturbed at the idea that prehistoric savages could have created such magnificent art. The Catholic Church sees this as an attack on Biblical truth. And Carthailac, the leading prehistorian, condemns Marcelino and his discovery as fakes. The family is thrown into crisis and the cave locked up. It takes all their love for each other to find a way through to redemption and recognition.

programme.title: Black Mountain
programme.desc: At a site 100 miles from the nearest native reservation, during a Canadian winter, a group of archaeologists have made a startling discovery: The tip of a mysterious, ancient structure, which bears some archaic engravings. The crew, led by Jensen, attempt to decipher it but some mysteries are better left buried. As they delve further into the structure's origins, things at their camp turn strange. Communications fail, local workers suddenly disappear and the men are stricken with a terrible illness. It's not long before they begin to feel the effects of solitude and then things get really bad...

programme.title: Voice from the Stone
programme.desc: A haunting horror thriller set in an isolated castle in 1950s Tuscany, Voice From the Stone tells the story of Verena (Emilia Clarke: TV’s Game of Thrones, Me Before You), a determined young nurse who is hired to aid a boy through the trauma of his mother's sudden death. As she works with the troubled boy, she falls under the spell of a malevolent force inside the castle.

programme.title: Kids in Love
programme.desc: SIMULTANEOUS RELEASE. IN CINEMAS NOW! Set against the backdrop of an underground, bohemian London, Kids in Love offers a new take on the traditional coming of age story. Drifting through his gap year with internships and travel plans, Jack has always suspected there was more to life than this. A chance encounter with the beautiful and ethereal Evelyn and her friends, including free spirited Viola, swerves his life radically off course. She is like no one he's ever met before, and he quickly becomes caught up in a whirlwind of all-day parties and wild nights in London's hidden dives with her charismatic friends.

programme.title: Behind Closed Doors
programme.desc: An ordinary day in young Agnes' (Jennifer Lawrence The Hunger Games) life is anything but. With a strung-out mother (Selma Blair - Hellboy), a pimp father (Bokeem Woodbine Total Recall) and a home overrun by gamblers, thieves and johns, Agnes is simply trying to survive with her two younger sisters (Sophia Bairley and Chloe Grace Moretz - Carrie). Inspired by true events this poignant, gritty film portrays lives that rise above dismal circumstances, and marks a powerful beginning for first time Writer and Director Lori Petty.

programme.title: Red Dog: The Early Years
programme.desc: RED DOG: THE EARLY YEARS is a glorious tale of youthful adventure set in the Australian outback as a young boy and an Australian Kelpie sheep dog become the best of friends. Set in the late 1980s, 11-year-old Mick is sent to live with his stern farmer grandfather on a vast cattle station. There, he forms an unbreakable bond with a cute puppy he finds covered in blue mud after a storm. Together the pair embark on a series of great adventures amidst the stunning Aussie landscape.

programme.title: Mortdecai
programme.desc: Juggling some angry Russians, the British Mi5, his impossibly leggy wife and an international terrorist, debonair art dealer and part time rogue Charlie Mortdecai (Johnny Depp) must traverse the globe armed only with his good looks and special charm in a race to recover a stolen painting rumored to contain the code to a lost bank account filled with Nazi gold.

programme.title: Kill Command
programme.desc: Set in the very near future, an elite squad of highly trained marines, led by commanding officer Captain Bukes, are sent on a routine training exercise to a remote island, from which all communications have been cut off. Accompanying them on the mission is 'tech head' Specialist Mills, a mysterious coder whose brain is interfaced with a computer. When they reach the island, the unit soon discover they are not alone and the exercise is far from routine. They become live targets of terrifyingly advanced military robots and begin to suspect that Mills is somehow involved in the conspiracy. But without the help of Mill's technology, they know they won't survive.

programme.title: Gutshot Straight
programme.desc: A professional poker player falls deep into the underworld when he takes an unexpected wager from a mysterious high roller. In order to protect himself and his family, he must try and get to the truth as he’s forced into a murder plot making him the prime target for revenge. This action thriller’s star cast includes George Eads (TV's CSI), AnnaLynne McCord (TV's 90210), Steven Seagal (A Good Man, Hard to Kill), Vinnie Jones (Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels, Snatch), Stephen Lang (Avatar), Tia Carrere (Wayne’s World, True Lies) and Ted Levine (American Gangster, Shutter Island).

programme.title: Vengeance
programme.desc: Niagra Falls police detective and Iraq war veteran John Dromoor (Nicolas Cage The Rock) is flagged down by a 12 year old girl after she witnesses her mother, Teena, being brutally attacked and left for dead by a group of local men. When the men are caught, their parents hire slick criminal defence attorney Jay Kirkpatrick, (Don Johnson Django Unchained) who puts the focus on Teena s credibility, based on her sobriety and promiscuity. Shockingly her assailants are exonerated and released, even though the daughter s testimony should have alone been enough for a certain conviction.

programme.title: Deep Space
programme.desc: Two years ago, a deep space mining vessel went dark and has been drifting through space since. Though the suspicion is that the crew killed each other, what truly happened is a mystery and why they would kill each other even less clear. Now a rescue team is tasked with investigating the ship and finding some answers.
